attributes.action: Reinstate Professor David Nutt and sack Alan Johnson as Home Secretary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Science is the single most important element of our modern society and we cannot have politics ignoring scientific evidence to save face on bad policies. You are not educating the public by censoring Professor Nutt, you are undermining our freedom and democracy.
In light of what has transpired it can only be surmised that Alan Johnson is not fit for public office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
